page.title: 15 THE CHURCH
page.content: The church in Bow Brickhill is fairly well attended and is celebrating it's 800th anniversary this year. It was built in 1185. The church brings out a small leaflet every month called the Bow Brickhill Parish News,it gives you information about the services held in church. Here are the services held in October 1985. Bow Brickhill_All Saints October 6th Family Communion October 13th Holy Communion October 20th Holy Communion (said) evening prayer October 27th Holy Communion There is a lovely view of the village and surrounding district.From the church tower as it sits on top of a hill at the edge of woodland.
